content.title: Intro
content.content:
"A Far Green Country"


Album	The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - The Complete Recordings

Credits

Composed by	Howard Shore
Performed by	London Philharmonic Orchestra

Track Info

Duration	1:27
Track No.	Disc 3 Track 8
Previous	Dernhelm in Battle
Next	Shieldmaiden of Rohan

Media



"A Far Green Country" is the eighth track of disc three of The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - The Complete Recordings by Howard Shore.
